        Returns:
        True if the string a contains b ignoring case differences

        public static java.lang.String ensureEndsWith​(java.lang.String text,
                                              java.lang.String terminator)
        Returns:
        The given text with the terminator appended if it doesn't already end in the terminator

        True if the strings are equal

        Returns:

      • isAllBytes

        public static boolean isAllBytes​(java.lang.String text)
        Returns:
        True if every character in the given text is a byte value

        Returns:
        True if every character in the given text is an ASCII value

        Returns:
        True if the string is null, empty or contains only whitespace

      • isExtendedAscii

        public static boolean isExtendedAscii​(java.lang.String value)
        Returns:
        True if every character in the given string is an ASCII value

                                       int start,
                                       int end,
                                       java.lang.String replacement)
        Returns:
        The given string with a range of characters replaced by the given replacement

      • replaceAll

        public static java.lang.String replaceAll​(java.lang.String s,
                                          java.lang.String searchFor,
                                          java.lang.String replaceWith)
        Replace all occurrences of one string replaceWith another string. Note that this does not require the compilation of a regular expression and is faster.
        Parameters:
        s - The string to process
        searchFor - The value to search for
        replaceWith - The value to searchFor replaceWith
        Returns:
        The resulting string with searchFor replaced with replaceWith

      • startsWithIgnoreCase

        public static boolean startsWithIgnoreCase​(java.lang.String text,
                                           java.lang.String prefix)
        Returns:
        True if the given text starts with the given prefix, ignoring case differences

      • trailing

        public static java.lang.String trailing​(java.lang.String string,
                                        int n)
        Returns:
        The trailing n characters of the given string
